name: Delivery (8BitSquid)
description:
You may need to go in to fullscreen for the space command on the title screen to work.

How to play:

Arrow keys control movement

Space bar lets the player use their scooter to move faster.

Enter interacts with objects such as deliver locations and charging points.

Driving on the wrong side of the road? Driving the wrong way down a one way street? You will lose Clips for this, if you lose all your clips or don't make your quoter of deliveries in time its game over.

Yellow markings on the road are safe areas.

Drive or walk in water and it will slow you down.

Finding your pickup point is all about luck, keep searching.

Press P to pull up your phone and it will show you where the drop-off point is.

Credits:


Everything besides the music is made by me (8bitSquid)

Music is an external asset by Circlerun and can be found on open game art under the name of Adventure, Platform, Menu, BGM pack I

Made for Jame Gam #18 Theme Money is time with special item Clips.
  • Matches theme by losing reward amount every few seconds until you deliver the package because as we all know time is money.
  • Special Item Clip: The name of the currency is Clips which look like paperclips which are used to charge your electric scooter and pay fines for driving on the wrong side or the road and in the wrong lane.

Game updates:

29/04/2022: Reworked phone location system so it now works correctly all the time. Added Icon to show you are holding a package. 

Fixed a bug which let you deliver nothing. 

Fixed bug which would cause level 2 not to load.

s28/04/2022: Hopefully fixed bug which showed the wrong delivery location( When deliver point was the hospital Charge station showed and vice versa)
